title: Senior Backend Engineer
summary: Highly accomplished Senior Backend Engineer with 8+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable, high-performance microservices and distributed systems. Expert in Python and Go, with extensive experience in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes). Proven ability to lead projects, mentor junior engineers, and drive technical excellence in fast-paced, agile environments.

cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, SQS, SNS, RDS)
GCP (Compute Engine, Cloud Functions, Pub/Sub, BigQuery)

description: Led the design and implementation of a new microservices architecture using Go and gRPC, improving system scalability by 30% and reducing latency by 20%.
Developed and maintained critical API endpoints for high-volume data processing, handling over 100M daily requests with stringent SLA requirements.
Mentored a team of 4 junior and mid-level engineers, fostering best practices in code quality, testing, and deployment strategies.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitLab CI and Kubernetes, automating deployments and reducing release cycle time by 40%.
Collaborated with product and frontend teams to define API specifications and integrate new features seamlessly.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs for a real-time data analytics platform using Python (Django/Flask) and PostgreSQL.
Optimized database queries and built caching mechanisms with Redis, resulting in a 25% performance improvement for critical data fetches.
Contributed to the migration of legacy monolith applications to a more modular, service-oriented architecture.
Wrote comprehensive unit and integration tests to ensure code reliability and maintainability.
Participated in on-call rotations, diagnosing and resolving production issues efficiently.
Developed and maintained components of an internal project management tool using Java and Spring Boot.
Assisted in the development of new features, bug fixes, and performance enhancements.
Learned and applied Agile methodologies, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint reviews.
Wrote documentation for newly implemented features and API endpoints.
